metadata.name: Interactive Bash Suspicious Children
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious interactive bash as a parent to rather uncommon child processes

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line) = lower('bash -i') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-c import ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('base64')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('pty.spawn')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('whoami')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('iptables')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/ncat')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/nc')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/netcat'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious interactive bash as a parent to rather uncommon child processes

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate software that uses these patterns Reference: Internal Research
